[[Boomerang France]]
[[Boing (French TV channel)]] | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System France''' is Turner's French division. The company is based in Paris.[http://emploi.journaldunet.com/entreprise/6942/turner-broadcasting-system-france-sas.html Journaldunet][http://www.eutelsat.com/news/compress/fr/2007/pdf/CP_0707_TBS.pdf Eutelsat] ==Channels== * [[Cartoon Network (France)]] * [[Boomerang France]] * [[Boing (French TV channel)]] * [[Turner Classic Movies]] * [[TCM Cinema]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://europe.turnerinfo.com Turner Broadcasting System Europe] * [http://www.turnermediainnovations.com/ Turner Media Innovations] * [http://www.boingtv.fr Boing France] * [http://tcmfr.com TCM France] * [http://www.boomerangtv.fr/ Boomerang France] * [http://www.cartoonnetwork.fr Cartoon Network (France)] {{TBS}} {{Time Warner}} {{French television stations}} [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System]] [[Category:Time Warner]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Europe]] [[Category:Companies based in Paris]] [[Category:Media companies of France]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System France]]
